entries.title: Renewed Russian attacks mark Ukraine’s grim start to 2023
entries.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy praises Ukrainians' 'sense of unity' in the face of Russian bombardment.

entries.title: What are the legal consequences of Israel’s occupation?
entries.description: The UN has passed a resolution to seek the legal opinion of the International Court of Justice.

entries.title: Libyan authorities find mass grave in ex-ISIL stronghold
entries.description: Eighteen bodies unburied in the Sabaa area of Sirte, which was under the  2015-2016 control of ISIL fighters.

entries.title: Photos: Huge crowds gather for Lula’s swearing-in ceremony
entries.description: Veteran leftist takes office for an historic third term after defeating far-right leader Jair Bolsonaro in elections.

entries.title: How will Pele be remembered?
entries.description: Football great Pele left an unprecedented legacy and inspired millions worldwide.

entries.title: Power outages at Philippine airports disrupt travel for thousands
entries.description: Hundreds of flights to and from Manila halted due to air traffic control malfunction, stranding passengers at airports.

entries.title: Tight security as Lula set to be sworn in as Brazil’s president
entries.description: Veteran leader taking office for 3rd term facing challenge of uniting nation polarised under predecessor Jair Bolsonaro.

entries.title: Photos: New Year 2023 celebrations around the world
entries.description: From New Zealand to New York City, revellers welcome 2023 with confetti, fireworks and dancing.

entries.title: Croatia adopts euro, enters borderless Europe club on New Year
entries.description: The Balkan nation bids farewell to its kuna currency as it enters Europe's passport-free Schengen zone.

entries.title: World welcomes 2023, leaving a stormy year behind
entries.description: It was a year marked by the conflict in Ukraine, economic stresses and the effects of global warming.

entries.title: EU calls on Rwanda to stop supporting M23 rebels in DR Congo
entries.description: The bloc's comments came after UN experts' report found 'direct intervention' by Rwandan forces inside DR Congo.

entries.title: Stampede during New Year fireworks kills at least nine in Uganda
entries.description: At least nine people die in a shopping mall crush as revellers rang in the New Year in capital Kampala, police said.

entries.title: India, Pakistan exchange lists of nuclear facilities, prisoners
entries.description: The practice has been in place since 1992, with the list of nuclear installations exchanged annually on January 1.

entries.title: 2022 gave us a new social media autocrat
entries.description: Will 2023 give us a revolution that will topple him?

entries.title: Colombia agrees ceasefire with main armed groups: President
entries.description: President Gustavo Petro announces ceasefire with five largest armed groups to support peace talks.

entries.title: Colombia and Venezuela to fully reopen shared border
entries.description: The two countries will allow passage of cargo and passenger transport via cross-border Tienditas Bridge from January 1.

entries.title: Australia, Canada impose COVID curbs on travellers from China
entries.description: Australia, Canada are the latest to impose restrictions on travellers from China amid a surge in COVID-19 cases.

entries.title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 312
entries.description: As the Russia-Ukraine war enters its 312th day, we take a look at the main developments.

entries.title: Several feared dead in blast outside Kabul military airport
entries.description: Explosion outside the airport causes multiple casualties, a spokesman for the Taliban-run interior ministry says.

entries.title: Two refugees die, 232 rescued after boat capsizes off Lebanon
entries.description: Tripoli residents who are in contact with the survivors say a woman and a child - both Syrian - have died.

entries.title: Brazil’s third-time president Lula has new economic problems
entries.description: Unlike Lula’s first two terms in office, the current economic outlook is gloomy with high inflation and interest rates.

entries.title: China accuses US of ‘slander, hype’ after aircraft clash
entries.description: Beijing says US distorted facts following a confrontation between a Chinese jet and a US plane over the South China Sea.

entries.title: Explosions rock Ukraine’s Kyiv in early hours of New Year’s Day
entries.description: New round of blasts in the Ukrainian capital follows a barrage of missile attacks that killed one and wounded a dozen.

entries.title: Kim orders an ‘exponential increase’ in N Korea’s nuclear arsenal
entries.description: Kim's comments came as N Korea fired a short-range ballistic missile in a rare late-night, New Year's Day weapons test.
